subject: Shortlist
noticeText:
1)  The test link will be mailed to the students. The test link is intended exclusively for the shortlisted candidates listed in the attachment. Please refrain from sharing it with anyone not on the list. 



(2) To start the test, system would require you to operate in a full screen setting. Before beginning, close all windows, tabs, email, antivirus software and any chat applications and set your system to Do Not Disturb mode. Any notification may result in a warning, leading to disqualification.



(3)  It is crucial for each student to review the system requirements and instructions at the beginning of the test, which will only take a few minutes.



(4)  The start page will require some preliminary information, such as your full name and official valid campus email address on which you will receive OTP to proceed. Candidates must use their official valid campus email address to attempt the assessment, and it can only be done on a laptop/desktop. Mobile phones are not permitted.



(5)  Ensure that the internet connection is stable at the test location. If there is a drop in connectivity, do not close the test window or tab, and resume the test from the same window or tab once the connection is restored

Software Engineering Role: 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM on 20th July 2025

Data Science and Analytics Role: 8:00 AM - 10:00 AM



Please note that the test link will only be active in the given window.

subject: Urgent
company: Travelling window for potentially eligible students for Internship 2025-26
noticeText:
All the students who will register for CDC internship process of 2025-26 may note:



Travel window for the potentially eligible students for internship will be from 11th July to 13th July, 2025.



All the tests (if conducted) before the travel window time will be conducted online, that means students can write their tests / process from their respective locations.



From 18th July 2025 onwards all the tests may be conducted at Nalanda and student must come to Nalanda to write the test / process, otherwise their candidature will be treated as null and void.

subject: Urgent
noticeText:
Opening of CV portal for CDC Internship registration _2025-26



All the potential eligible students of compulsory Internship (who will go for internship 2026 summer) are advised to kindly note the followings:



CV Portal in ERP for CV building (for Internship) is being started from today (19/06/2025) and will be open till 26th June 2025, 11.59 pm



a) You will be provided very short duration, so be alert and follow CDC notice board in ERP to have regular updates.



b) By enrolling in the CDC Internship portal, you are also confirming that, you will go for compulsory internship in the year 2026 from May to Mid-July (as per academic schedule).



c) Please pass this message to your fellow mates who will go for compulsory internship in the year 2026.



d) Registration for Internship is must and CDC, IIT Kharagpur is requesting all the students to participate in internship activities with positive spirit.



Note: For students who have applied for B.Tech/ BS to Dual degree/ MS conversion will be given the access in due course of time to register in CDC portal.
